title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 501.4 - Applications for waiver
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 501.4 - Applications for waiver

State Regulations

Applications for waiver of a rule or regulation must be
made in writing and verified. The application shall state the facts and reasons
in support of such request. Any rule or regulation may be waived by the
commissioner upon the commissioner's own motion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
501.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
